job.description: A workflow that uses Azure REST API to create a HDInsight Spark Cluster. It requires as input the variable ARM_TEMPLATE, which takes as value an Azure ARM template. A ready-to-use template called "Azure_HDInsight_Spark_ARM_Template.json" is provided in the global dataspace. Furthermore, the workflow customizes the ARM template with respect to the provided input variables. Once the Spark cluster is deployed successfully, the workflow produces as job results: (i) URL of the Web UI of the HDInsight Spark cluster, (ii) SSH host of the head node (i.e., master) of the cluster, (iii) SSH port of the head node (i.e., master) of the cluster, and (iv) a file containing the set of input variables. Use the Workflow Azure_HDInsight_Spark_Send_Signal${SIGNAL_TO_SEND} to manage the HDInsight cluster, i.e., perform scale or delete operations.

signals = variables.get("SIGNALS")
